Controls Mixer interactivity.

Due to the shutdown of the {{w|Mixer (service)|Mixer}} service, this command was removed and permanently unusable, due to it requiring the [https://mixer.com/lab/interactive Interactive lab] setup inside the Mixer website.

== Syntax ==
* <code>mixer <stop: string></code>
* <code>mixer <scene: string> <sceneName: string></code>
* <code>mixer <start: string> <version: int> [shareCode: string]</code>

== Arguments ==
<code>start</code>
* Starts the interactive board.

<code>version</code>
* Specifies the version ID of the player's board.
** Example: <code>000001</code>

<code>shareCode</code>
* Specifies the share code of the player's board.
** Example: <code>0000aaaa</code>

<code>scene</code>
* Changes scene.

<code>sceneName</code>
* Specifies the name of the scene the player wants to change to.
** Example: <code>default</code>

<code>stop</code>
* Specifies that the player wants to stop the interactive board.

== Result ==
<code>start</code> mode:
* The MixPlay board begins.

<code>scene</code> mode:
* The scene changes.

<code>stop</code> mode:
* The MixPlay board shuts down.

Fails if the arguments are not specified correctly.
